name: Ismail Habibi
story: Abbas Yusufzai was born into a devout Muslim family in Afghanistan. As a young man, he joined the Taliban in hopes of fighting for his country's freedom. However, he soon grew disillusioned with their methods and eventually left the group. He later joined the Iranian Revolutionary Guard Corps, where he honed his skills as a marksman. After years of service, he was sent to Altis as part of a joint operation with CSAT forces. Despite his advancing age, Abbas remains a vital asset to his team, thanks to his keen eye and steady aim. He has two children, a son and a daughter, whom he dearly loves and worries for when he is on missions.
